questions.short_description: My video will be public, available to anyone for improving computer vision.
questions.long_description: My video will be public, available to anyone for improving computer vision.

questions.short_description: My video will be private, available only to these organizations (${PROJECT_TEAM_MEMBERS}) and no one else.
questions.long_description: My video will be private, available only to these organizations (${PROJECT_TEAM_MEMBERS}) and no one else.

questions.short_description: My face in this video can be used to improve facial biometrics.
questions.long_description: My face in this video can be used to improve facial biometrics.

questions.short_description: My video will be retained indefinitely.
questions.long_description: My video will be retained indefinitely.

questions.short_description: My video will be retained for at most 4 years, then deleted.
questions.long_description: My video will be retained for at most 4 years, then deleted.

questions.short_description: I can revoke my consent for any video at any time for any reason, and the video will be deleted.
questions.long_description: I can revoke my consent for any video at any time for any reason, and the video will be deleted.

questions.short_description: I do not consent to this data collection.
questions.long_description: I do not consent to this data collection.
